Item.Description: A Kingdom that profits from buying and selling goods across the region.
A Kingdom that primarily raids nearby Kingdoms.
A Kingdom whose primary export is stone and ore, which they offer at a reduced rate. They are willing to trade more for basic supplies like food, drink, bandages and pick axes.
A Kingdom whose primary export are logs, which they offer at a reduced rate. They are willing to trade more for basic supplies like food, drink, bandages and pick axes.
A Kingdom whose primary export is food, drink, cloth and livestock, which they offer at a reduced rate.
